Name: Unforgettable Ominous Dream
Desc:
Scratches the enemy with the power of the specter in your hand. Changes to Unforgettable Nightmare in Flora form.
It can be chained with all skills, and skills that are chained with Unforgettable Ominous Dream is used in place instead of moving. But, even if the skill is chained, you can move using the direction keys.

H.Old:
Attacks up to 6 enemies at 120% damage 6 times.
Recovers 1% of Max HP upon hit.
No cooldown.
H.New:
Attacks up to 6 enemies at 120% Damage 6 times.
Restores 1% of Max HP on hit.
